author: Lon.TV
description:
Thanks to our sponsor Oclean! https://lon.tv/oclean - Public Knowledge, the EFF, Consumer Reports and a number of other organizations filed a very strong argument with the FCC opposing DRM encryption of the public airwaves! I'll take a look at their report and talk about what's next as the public comment period nears the end. See more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1fgV-Z1RllQ&list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:29 - Sponsor: Oclean A10 Flosser - https://lon.tv/oclean
02:18 - Public Knowledge Filing Intro
03:46 - The Broadcast Flag Argument
05:33 - "Not a Private Fiefdom"
06:15 - Marketplace concerns
07:06 - Fair Use : Sony vs. Universal Argument
09:49 - DRM is privately regulated
11:17 - What's Next?
11:58 - Can you still file with the FCC?
12:46 - FCC Timeline
14:50 - Interview next week

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists! 
Weekly Breakdown of Posted Videos:  - https://lon.tv/email
Dail
title: Public Knowledge, the EFF Fighting ATSC 3 DRM for Over the Air Television!
